text.paragraph: This section contains the following subsections: Pathology Test Result, Imaging Examination Result and Requested Service(s).

td.paragraph:
GLUCOSE - FASTING
BLOOD GLUCOSE 10.8 * mmol/L (3.9-6.0)
Values for Diagnosis of Diabetes Mellitus and other Hyperglycaemia
DIABETES MELLITUS (DM) Fasting & > 6.9 mmol/L or 2 hrs post load & > 11.0 mmol/L
IMPAIRED FASTING GLYCAEMIA (IFG) Fasting & > 6.0 mmol/L and & < 7.0 mmol/L
Date Collected : 07/07/2005 Time Collected : 12:15 Reference Episode : 1 Units Range ============== ==========
GLUCOSE - FASTING BLOOD GLUCOSE : 10.8 * mmol/L (3.9-6.0)
